meanings.definition: Relating to or situated outside the pyramidal tracts of the brain.
meanings.sent1: The extrapyramidal area of the brain helps with movement control.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the extrapyramidal regions to understand brain functions better.
meanings.sent3: The extrapyramidal pathways are like secret tunnels in the brain.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced along extrapyramidal roads, bypassing the usual routes.
meanings.sent5: The extrapyramidal regions are like hidden gardens in the brain, guiding our movements.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the extrapyramidal system, a neural network in the brain involved in motor control.
meanings.sent1: The extrapyramidal system coordinates muscle movements in the body.
meanings.sent2: Injuries to the extrapyramidal network can affect coordination.
meanings.sent3: The extrapyramidal system is like a conductor orchestrating our movements.
meanings.sent4: His dance moves were as smooth as an extrapyramidal pathway.
meanings.sent5: The extrapyramidal system is the silent director behind our physical actions.
